data.actual_result: Add Reaction button is present when permission is denied
data.expected_result: Add Reaction button is not present when permission is denied
data.short_description: Option to add reactions is present even when the reactions permission is denied
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a channel where your add reactions permission is denied - Scroll over a message in the channel and observe the add reaction button is present - Try to add a reaction
